responses: 0: Most major parties are competitive in only one or two regions of the country, i.e., their
support is heavily concentrated in a few areas.
1: Most major parties are competitive in some regions of the country, but not in others.
2: Most major parties are competitive in most regions of the country.
citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: Which of the following best describes the nature of electoral support for major parties(those gaining over 10 % of the vote)?
name: v2pscomprg, *_osp, *_ord
